title: Launching external processes from Java using the raw java.lang.ProcessBuilder API directly can be a little cumbersome. The
Apache Commons Exec library
a
https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-exec/
makes it a little easier. The
ch.vorburger.exec library
a
https://github.com/vorburger/MariaDB4j/issues/45
further extends upon Commons Exec to make it truly convenient:
